content:
We are doing a river cruise from Luxor to Aswan before Cairo, so that is covered and will do the hot air balloon there.

My current interests in this are 1, 4, 8, 10.

Also curious about like a night horse safari of the Pyramids? Also can I just see the light show of the pyramids from my hotel - Comfort Inn Sphinx?

Make this into 4/5 day itinerary for me, filling out some more details
